name: Sword of Sharpness
location: Ancient armories, dragon hoards, legendary warriors' tombs
description: When you attack an object with this magic sword and hit, maximize your weapon damage dice against the target. When you attack a creature with this weapon and roll a 20 on the attack roll, that target takes an extra 4d6 slashing damage. Then roll another d20. If you roll a 20, you lop off one of the target's limbs, with the effect of such loss determined by the DM.

abilities.name: Keen Edge
abilities.description: This weapon deals maximum damage to objects and structures.

abilities.name: Vorpal Strike
abilities.description: On a natural 20, deals extra damage and may sever limbs on another natural 20.

name: Cloak of Elvenkind
location: Elven courts, ancient forests, hidden groves
description: While you wear this cloak with its hood up, Wisdom (Perception) checks made to see you have disadvantage, and you have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide, as the cloak's color shifts to camouflage you. Pulling the hood up or down requires an action.

properties.Camouflage: Disadvantage on Perception to see you

abilities.name: Camouflage
abilities.description: The cloak shifts color to blend with surroundings when the hood is up.

name: Ring of Protection
location: Ancient temples, powerful wizards' vaults, royal treasuries
description: You gain a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws while wearing this ring.

abilities.name: Magical Protection
abilities.description: Provides constant defensive bonuses to the wearer.

name: Bag of Holding
location: Magic shops, adventurer gear stores, wizard laboratories
description: This bag has an interior space considerably larger than its outside dimensions, roughly 2 feet in diameter at the mouth and 4 feet deep. The bag can hold up to 500 pounds, not exceeding a volume of 64 cubic feet. The bag weighs 15 pounds, regardless of its contents.

abilities.name: Extradimensional Space
abilities.description: Contains a pocket dimension for storage with weight and volume limits.

abilities.name: Retrieval
abilities.description: You can use an action to reach into the bag and pull out any specific object you choose.

name: Staff of Power
attunement: yes (by a sorcerer, warlock, or wizard)
location: Archmage towers, ancient magical academies, planar vaults
description: This staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff that grants a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. While holding it, you gain a +2 bonus to Armor Class, saving throws, and spell attack rolls.

abilities.name: Spell Storage
abilities.description: Can cast various spells by expending charges: Cone of Cold (5), Fireball (5), Globe of Invulnerability (6), Hold Monster (5), Levitate (2), Lightning Bolt (5), Magic Missile (1), Ray of Enfeeblement (1), Wall of Force (5).

abilities.name: Retributive Strike
abilities.description: As an action, you can break the staff over your knee or against a solid surface. The staff explodes in a 30-foot radius sphere centered on it.

name: Boots of Speed
location: Racing circuits, messenger guilds, scout outposts
description: While you wear these boots, you can use a bonus action and click the boots' heels together. If you do, the boots double your walking speed, and any creature that makes an opportunity attack against you has disadvantage on the attack roll. If you click your heels together again, you end the effect.

abilities.name: Haste
abilities.description: Click heels to double speed and gain protection from opportunity attacks.

name: Amulet of Health
location: Healing temples, divine shrines, monasteries
description: Your Constitution score is 19 while you wear this amulet. It has no effect on you if your Constitution is already 19 or higher.

abilities.name: Enhanced Constitution
abilities.description: Sets Constitution to 19, improving health, saves, and overall hardiness.

name: Potion of Greater Healing
location: Alchemist shops, temple stores, dungeon treasure
description: You regain 4d4 + 4 hit points when you drink this potion. The potion's red liquid glimmers when agitated.

abilities.name: Greater Healing
abilities.description: Restores significantly more health than a standard healing potion.

name: Wand of Magic Missiles
location: Magic academies, wizard towers, enchanted armories
description: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast the magic missile spell from it. For 1 charge, you cast the 1st-level version of the spell. You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional charge you expend.

abilities.name: Magic Missile
abilities.description: Cast Magic Missile at various levels by expending charges.

name: Gloves of Missile Snaring
location: Monk monasteries, archer guilds, defensive fortifications
description: These gloves seem to almost meld into your hands when you don them. When a ranged weapon attack hits you while you're wearing them, you can use your reaction to reduce the damage by 1d10 + your Dexterity modifier, provided that you have a free hand. If you reduce the damage to 0, you can catch the missile if it is small enough for you to hold in that hand.

abilities.name: Missile Defense
abilities.description: Reduce ranged attack damage and potentially catch projectiles.

name: Helm of Telepathy
location: Mind flayer ruins, psionic research labs, mental institutions
description: While wearing this helm, you can use an action to cast the detect thoughts spell (save DC 13) from it. As long as you maintain concentration on the spell, you can use a bonus action to send a telepathic message to a creature you are focused on.

abilities.name: Detect Thoughts
abilities.description: Cast Detect Thoughts spell once per day.

abilities.name: Telepathic Communication
abilities.description: Send mental messages to creatures you're reading with Detect Thoughts.

name: Immovable Rod
location: Engineering guilds, fortress construction sites, puzzle dungeons
description: This flat iron rod has a button on one end. You can use an action to press the button, which causes the rod to become magically fixed in place. Until you or another creature uses an action to push the button again, the rod doesn't move, even if it is defying gravity. The rod can hold up to 8,000 pounds of weight. More weight causes the rod to deactivate and fall.

abilities.name: Immobility
abilities.description: Becomes completely immovable in space when activated, defying gravity.

name: Deck of Many Things
location: Legendary treasure hoards, planar vaults, fate-touched locations
description: Usually found in a box or pouch, this deck contains a number of cards made of ivory or vellum. Most (75 percent) of these decks have only thirteen cards, but the rest have twenty-two. Before you draw a card, you must declare how many cards you intend to draw and then draw them randomly.

abilities.name: Random Fate
abilities.description: Each card drawn produces a powerful, often permanent effect ranging from beneficial to catastrophic.

abilities.name: Irreversible
abilities.description: Once drawn, cards cannot be returned to the deck and their effects are typically permanent.

name: Portable Hole
location: Dimensional research labs, planar merchants, wizard colleges
description: This fine black cloth, soft as silk, is folded up to the dimensions of a handkerchief. It unfolds into a circular sheet 6 feet in diameter. You can use an action to unfold a portable hole and place it on or against a solid surface, whereupon the portable hole creates an extradimensional hole 10 feet deep. The cylindrical space within the hole exists on a different plane, so it can't be used to create open passages.

abilities.name: Extradimensional Space
abilities.description: Creates a 10-foot deep hole that exists on another plane of existence.

abilities.name: Portable Storage
abilities.description: Can be folded up and carried easily, weighing practically nothing.

name: Cloak of Displacement
location: Feywild markets, displacer beast lairs, illusion magic academies
description: While you wear this cloak, it projects an illusion that makes you appear to be standing in a place near your actual location, causing any creature to have disadvantage on attack rolls against you. If you take damage, the property ceases to function until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Displacement Illusion
abilities.description: Projects false image of your position, making you harder to hit.

name: Gauntlets of Ogre Power
location: Ogre strongholds, strength training facilities, warrior guilds
description: Your Strength score is 19 while you wear these gauntlets. They have no effect on you if your Strength is 19 or higher.

abilities.name: Enhanced Strength
abilities.description: Sets Strength to 19, improving attack rolls, damage, and physical capabilities.

name: Rope of Climbing
location: Mountaineer supplies, dungeon explorer kits, thieves' guilds
description: This 60-foot length of silk rope weighs 3 pounds and can hold up to 3,000 pounds. If you hold one end of the rope and use an action to speak the command word, the rope animates. As a bonus action, you can command the other end to move toward a destination you choose.

abilities.name: Animate Rope
abilities.description: Rope moves on command, can tie itself, unknot itself, and climb surfaces.

name: Bracers of Defense
location: Monk monasteries, unarmored fighter schools, magical academies
description: While wearing these bracers, you gain a +2 bonus to AC if you are wearing no armor and using no shield.

abilities.name: Unarmored Defense
abilities.description: Provides significant AC bonus for characters who don't wear armor.

name: Crystal Ball
location: Divination towers, oracle temples, fortune teller shops
description: The typical crystal ball, a very rare item, is about 6 inches in diameter. While touching it, you can cast the scrying spell (save DC 17) with it.

abilities.name: Scrying
abilities.description: Cast the Scrying spell once per day to observe distant creatures or locations.

name: Eyes of the Eagle
location: Ranger outposts, scout training grounds, eagle aeries
description: These crystal lenses fit over the eyes. While wearing them, you have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight. In conditions of clear visibility, you can make out details of even extremely distant creatures and objects as small as 2 feet across.

abilities.name: Eagle Vision
abilities.description: Dramatically enhances visual perception and distance sight.
